description: Overview of the getAddress method
---

# getAddress

Asynchronously retrieves addresses from the inner object and returns the first address after applying the `getAddress` function.

## Import

```ts
import { WalletClientSigner } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { WalletClientSigner } from "@aa-sdk/core";
import { createWalletClient, custom } from "viem";
import { mainnet } from "viem/chains";

const client = createWalletClient({
  chain: mainnet,
  transport: custom(window.ethereum!),
});

const signer = new WalletClientSigner(client, "wallet");
console.log(await signer.getAddress());
```

## Returns

`Promise<string>`
A promise that resolves to the first address after being processed by the `getAddress` function.
